Class ğŸ—ƒ

ğŸ—ƒ represents an event queue. An ğŸ—ƒ instance holds events that have been generated by event sources that are registered with the queue. Events are stored in the order they are generated. Access is in a strictly FIFO (first-in-first-out) order.
